description: This file defines the 'EditorScreen' component for a note-taking app, enabling users to create or edit notes with features like setting title, content, color, and pinned status. It manages routing, state, and UI interactions including saving, pinning, and deleting notes.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles saving new or updated note data, then navigates back.

methods.name: useEffect
methods.description: Sets navigation options dynamically based on whether editing an existing note or creating a new one.
